short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf the web without the fear of spiders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps people control their fear of spiders by bluring images containing spiders on web pages.

Features:
- Blur images containing spiders
- Show blured images
